articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance Given by Students
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance Given by Students
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by members of student art groups of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education and other universities in Pyongyang.
					 They put on the stage such colorful numbers of various genres as chorus "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee," female chorus "Cuckoo on the Road to the Front," song and story-telling " My Unforgettable Teacher," story-telling and song "18 Years Old Hero," witticism "Traits" and chorus "Let Us Dash Like the Wind towards Thriving Nation."
					
					 The performance truthfully represented the fixed faith and will of the university students to accomplish the Juche revolutionary cause started in Mt. Paektu, single-mindedly following the great party, and their happiness of having an ample opportunity of learning under the loving care of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the successful performance replete with the revolutionary soldier spirit given by them with numbers of diverse genres truthfully reflecting the life of the students in the Songun era, he highly appreciated the performers' success and extended thanks to them.
					
					 The ideological and spiritual world and moral traits of our revolutionary and militant students are noble and beautiful, indeed, he said, adding that the sacred Korean revolution will steadily advance only along the road of victory as there is such dependable younger generation.
					
					 He highly appreciated the successes made by the universities in the past, noting that the WPK is satisfied with the fact that they have made a positive contribution to carrying out the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation by training a large number of able native cadres and technical talents playing a core role in the revolution and construction. 
					
					 It is one of the most important issues in accomplishing the Juche revolutionary cause and building a rich and powerful country to train our university students who will shoulder upon themselves the future of the country as valuable talents with ample knowledge, high morality and strong bodies, he said, and set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for the education and upbringing at the universities.
					
					 Among the audience were senior officials of the WPK Central Committee including its Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and department directors, and commanding officers of the Korean People's Army including KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk, Hyon Chol Hae, and Ri Myong Su and university teachers.

articles.title: Talks Held between Premiers of DPRK and China
articles.content:
Talks Held between Premiers of DPRK and China
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, and Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council of China, at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on Wednesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were the minister of Metal Industry, the minister of Agriculture, the minister of Foreign Trade, the minister of Culture and others and from the Chinese side were        minister of Foreign Affairs, the minister of Commerce, the minister of Culture and others. 
					
					At the talks Wen Jiabao asked Kim Yong Il to convey his warm regards to General Secretary
						Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Yong Il conveyed to Wen the greetings sent by Kim Jong Il to him. 
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the matter of further developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and the issues of mutual concern.
					
					 The DPRK side noted that the traditional DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations have reached a new higher stage under the profound care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 The DPRK side clarified the stand to develop in depth, together with the Chinese comrades, the bilateral relations of cooperation in a multi-faceted way on the principle of mutual benefit with the "year of DPRK-China friendship" as an occasion.
					
					 The Chinese side noted that the Sino-DPRK friendship provided by the revolutionaries of the elder generation of the two countries is the friendship which has grown strong through the struggle against the foreign aggressors and the acceleration of the revolution and construction in the two countries.
					
					 Pointing out that it is of great importance to significantly observe the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship" this year, the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries, the Chinese side expressed the belief that the exchange and cooperation between the two countries would become more brisk in various fields.
					
					 The talks proceeded in a comradely and friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: "Year of DPRK-China Friendship" Opens
articles.content:
"Year of DPRK-China Friendship" Opens
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The "year of DPRK-China friendship" was opened with due ceremony at the opera theater of the state theater in Beijing Wednesday. 
					 Present there were Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, the minister of Metal Industry, the minister of Agriculture, the minister of Foreign Trade, the minister of Culture and others.
					
					 It was attended by Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council, the minister of Foreign Affairs, the minister of Commerce, the minister of Culture, and other officials concerned and people from all walks of life of China.
					
					 Wen Jiabao in his speech made at the ceremony recalled that over the past six decades since the opening of diplomatic relations between the two countries China and the DPRK have made a positive contribution to the development in the two countries and the defence of peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world, firmly supporting and closely cooperating with each other and working hard together.
					
					 We have deep reverence for the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries who provided the great Sino-DPRK friendship, he noted.
					
					 He stressed that it is the consistent stand of China to steadily develop the Sino-DPRK friendly relations and bring greater benefit to the two peoples. 
					
					 He expressed the conviction that thanks to the concerted efforts of the two sides the Sino-DPRK friendship would develop with greater vitality and bear richer fruits. 
					
					 Kim Yong Il in his speech noted that the DPRK-China friendship was provided and developed by President Kim Il Sung and Chairman Mao Zedong and Premier Zhou Enlai and other revolutionaries of the elder generation, adding that the tradition of the bilateral friendship is the common treasure to be invariably carried forward and developed by the peoples of the two countries. 
					
					He stated that it is not only the will of General Secretary Kim Jong Il but the consistent stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK to boost the DPRK-China friendly relations.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government will make positive efforts to produce practical results by successfully holding colorful events for the "year of DPRK-China friendship" with the close cooperation with the Chinese party and government, he stressed.
					
					 Then there was a joint performance given by artistes of the two countries.

articles.title: Premier Kim Yong Il Welcomed in China
articles.content:
Premier Kim Yong Il Welcomed in China
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of welcoming Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Kim Yong Il took place at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing Wednesday.
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Yong Il and the minister of Metal Industry, the minister of Agriculture, the minister of Foreign Trade, the minister of Culture and others of the DPRK.
					
					 On hand were Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council, the vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Democratic League of China, the minister of Foreign Affairs, the minister of Commerce, the minister of Culture and other officials of China.
					
					 He, together with Wen, reviewed the guards of honor of the three services of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Feted
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Feted
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council of China, gave a reception in honor of Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on Wednesday.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il and the minister of Metal Industry, the minister of Agriculture, the minister of Foreign Trade, the minister of Culture and others.
					
					 Wen Jiabao and the vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Democratic League of China, the minister of Foreign Affairs, the minister of Commerce, the minister of Culture and others were on hand.
					
					 A performance was given by artistes.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Tours Shandong Province of China
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Tours Shandong Province of China
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and his suite visited Mt. Tai in Taian City of Shandong Province on March 18.
					 It was toured by President Kim Il Sung in October Juche 80 (1991).
					
					The visitors climbed Mt. Tai and commanded a bird's-eye view of the mountain, being briefed on the mountain famous for a lot of cultural relics and beautiful landscape. 
					
					 On March 17 the premier and his party visited a centre for cultivating standard red pepper in a county of the same province.

articles.title: Kim Yong Dae Meets EP Delegation of Group of Social Parties
articles.content:
Kim Yong Dae Meets EP Delegation of Group of Social Parties
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Group of Social Parties of the European Parliament on Wednesday.

articles.title: 60th Anniversary of Conclusion of Agreement between DPRK and Russia Marked
articles.content:
60th Anniversary of Conclusion of Agreement between DPRK and Russia Marked
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception on Tuesday on the occasion of the  60th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice-Premier Ro Tu Chol, Minister of Railways Jon Kil Su, Acting Chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Mun Jae Chol, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung, Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade O Ryong Chol, Vice-Minister of Culture Han Chol and officials concerned. 
					
					 Members of the Russian embassy here were present there. 
					
					 The ambassador said in his speech made at the reception that the principles of equality, mutual benefits and cooperation laid down in the agreement have been carried forward and developed by the Treaty of Friendship, Good Neighborliness  and Cooperation concluded between the two countries in 2000 and agreements reached at the meetings of the top leaders of the two countries. 
					
					Recalling that General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated twice the art performances given by Russian artistes last year, he stressed that he and his embassy officials would strive hard to boost the multi-faceted cooperation together with Korean comrades.
					
					 Ro Tu Chol said that the above-said agreement personally signed by President Kim Il Sung was a significant document which provided a legal foundation for developing mutually beneficial cooperation and exchange between the DPRK and Russia. 
					
					 He recalled that over the past six decades the two countries have developed cooperation in different fields in the spirit of the agreement. 
					
					 Noting that it is the DPRK's stand to further expand and develop the relations with Russia in conformity with the desires of the two peoples and the spirit of the joint documents agreed upon between them, Ro expressed the hope that everything would go well in Russia, a friendly neighbor.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Lao Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Lao Delegation
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the Ministry of Public Security of Laos.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned by Chanhsaveang Thitkhounthong, commander of Guards of the Ministry of Public Security of Laos who is leading the delegation, on March 18.

articles.title: New Mushroom Cultivation Technologies Developed
articles.content:
New Mushroom Cultivation Technologies Developed
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The mushroom institute of the State Academy of Sciences has achieved a lot of successes in scientific research, which are helpful towards the improvement of dietary life.
					 They make it possible to popularize and intensify the mushroom production without much effort to suit the natural and climate features of Korea and the raw-materials and cultivation conditions. The researchers there are striving to introduce the technologies on an expansion basis.
					
					 In particular, the agaric cultivation technology in a semi-vaulted greenhouse is popular, with which a large quantity of mushroom can be produced even in the temperature below zero.
					
					 They made quality supplementary nutrients and substrate ferment with deposit of sewage from pig farms, which considerably increase the mushroom yield.
					
					 The researchers have completed the method of cultivating agaric with waste matters after its cultivation as the main raw materials and proved successful in the research into introducing two-crop farming of mushroom.
					
					 This method, which doubles the utility rate of raw-materials, brings about a great huge profit upon its application.

articles.title: Spas Curative of Diseases
articles.content:
Spas Curative of Diseases
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Lots of spas are dotted in the DPRK.
					 They are found in the main in North and South Phyongan Provinces, South Hwanghae Province, Kangwon Province and North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The spas of Kim Jong Suk Sanatorium and Talchon Disabled Soldiers Sanatorium, Songchon Spa, Ongjin Spa, Sechon Spa, Pochonnaegok Spa and others contain radon in their water.
					
					Radon spa is potent for the treatment of cardiovascular system disorders and nervous system disorders.
					
					 It is also efficacious for curing operation sequela, injury of muscles and skin and contracture after operation, chronic osteomyelitis, rheumatic arthritis, women's diseases, skin disorders and digestive system disorders.   
					
					 The sulfuric spas in Sinchon, Paechon and other places are good for treatment of dermatosis.
					
					 The sulfuric spa produces good curative efficacy as the general action ingredients of the spa and the ions containing sulfur have direct influence upon the skin and respiratory mucosa and the absorbed sulfuric compounds work.
					
					 The chlorine-brine spas such as Phyongnam Spa, Unchon Spa and Yonan Spa No.2 are good for treatment of hypertension.
					
					 The chloride-brine spa is popular among hypertensives as it is helpful towards reducing blood pressure. 
					
					 The sanatoria furnished with modern curative facilities and means have been built in the spa areas of the DPRK, which serve the working people for the improvement of their health and for the prevention and treatment of diseases.

articles.title: U.S. Undisguised Scenario for Hegemony Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. Undisguised Scenario for Hegemony Flayed
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The United States mapped out plans to concentrate its forces present in south Korea on its military bases in Phyongthaek and Osan and is now pushing ahead with them. If these plans are implemented, the above-mentioned U.S. military bases will be the U.S. imperialists' biggest military bases for aggression and the U.S. forces' regional center in Northeast Asia.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed commentary. The U.S. claim that the concentration is a measure to cope with the "threat to the Asian region" is no more than sheer sophism and a twisted logic, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the threat to the Asian region is not posed by someone else but the U.S. 
					
					    The concentration is a revelation of the U.S. undisguised scenario to perpetuate the presence of the U.S. imperialist aggressors in south Korea and realize its ambition to dominate the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					    As a matter of fact, the U.S. is massively introducing ultra-modern equipment into south Korea and intensifying the military exercises simulating mobile operations inside and outside south Korea under the signboard of realizing the "strategic flexibility" of the U.S. forces present in south Korea.
					
					    It is very disturbing military moves for the U.S. imperialists to opt for expanding the U.S. military bases in south Korea and concentrating its forces on them. 
					
					    The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can realize its ambition to dominate the Asian region by force of arms. The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the reality and drop its foolish scenario for hegemony.

articles.title: Minju Joson Snubs Traitors' Anti-Reunification Ruckus
articles.content:
Minju Joson Snubs Traitors' Anti-Reunification Ruckus
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The "Advisory Council for Democracy and Peaceful Unification" of south Korea is making a "lecture tour" of different parts of south Korea allegedly for the purpose of "settling the conflict among south Koreans over the policy towards the north" and achieving a "popular consensus."
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: This "lecture tour" reportedly to last till April is nothing but a poor anti-reunification farce aimed at whitewashing the Lee Myung Bak's "policy towards the north" and inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 This is proved by what Ri Ki Thaek, chief vice-chairman of the said council, uttered in a lecture given in Inchon. He talked nonsense that the reunification is "possible only when there is understanding" among the neighboring countries. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It was outside forces that split the Korean nation. Ri's assertion that the country can be reunified only when there is "understanding" among foreign forces is, in fact, a reckless anti-reunification remark as it is intended to perpetuate the national division indefinitely.
					
					 The above-said rubbish of Ri is aimed at justifying the Lee group's treacherous and anti-reunification act of inviting outside forces to meddle in the issue of reunification, challenging the desire of the nation. Now it has become clear that the above-mentioned council grouping such traitors as Ri Ki Thaek who stake their fate on foreign forces is nothing but a puppet anti-reunification organization harmful to the country's reunification.
					
					 If such philistines as Ri persist in bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and blocking the independent reunification, selling off the dignity and interests of the nation to outsiders as mean stooges of traitor Lee Myung Bak, they will not be able to escape a stern judgment of history. This is a warning to them.
					
					 The gentries of the said council had better stop their anti-reunification farce, bearing in mind that the above-mentioned "lecture tour" will only precipitate their own self-destruction.

articles.title: Punishment of War Maniacs by Arms Urged
articles.content:
Punishment of War Maniacs by Arms Urged
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The United States and the south Korean puppet war-like forces are staging the madcap war exercises across south Korea to mount a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK from land, air and seas.
					 Citing data to disclose such attempts, Minju Joson Wednesday in a signed commentary stresses that the war maniacs, the aggressors, should be punished with arms, not with words.
					
					 The ongoing joint military exercises of the U.S. are, in essence, little short of instigating the south Korean puppets to ignite a war of aggression on the DPRK through preemptive attack without worrying about full support from the U.S. in "contingency," the commentary points out, and says:
					
					 What is more intolerable is that the U.S. has talked nonsense that the DPRK is "excessively reacting" to the exercises and that it should "restrain" itself.
					
					 The historical facts show that there has been no use advising or warning the U.S. and its followers to drop their reckless hostile policy towards the DPRK, though it had done so frequently that they could understand.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' moves for a war of aggression should be countered with merciless and resolute just war for reunification. This is the truth and lesson the DPRK drew from its anti-U.S. confrontation struggle of decades.
					
					 The arms of the DPRK built up with the inexhaustible mental power of the strong revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu and Songun do not show mercy.
					
					 If the enemies intrude into the inviolable territory of the DPRK even 0.001mm, its army and people would wage the most powerful and scathing, anti-U.S. sacred war, the war for reunification to root out the sources of war and successfully accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, the cherished desire of the Koreans.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand against U.S.-S. Korean War Exercises Hailed in Peru
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand against U.S.-S. Korean War Exercises Hailed in Peru
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Peruvian organizations made public statements on Mar. 11 in support of the principled stand taken by the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to cope with the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism said in a statement that the joint military exercises, being staged on an unprecedentedly large scale by the U.S. and south Korean puppets, have been censured by the world peace-loving people.
					
					The statement stressed that the group would extend full support to the party, the government, the army and the people of the DPRK that have turned out to defend people-centered socialism and the world peace under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, in a statement, bitterly condemned the moves of the U.S., Japan and the south Korean authorities to unleash a new war on the Korean Peninsula and called upon the world peace-loving people to oppose the war moves of the U.S. and its followers with heightened awareness.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Denounced in Indonesia
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Denounced in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Ristiyanto, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Vanguard Party of Indonesia, on Mar. 11 made public a statement in denunciation of the joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces.
					 The statement noted that the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for aggression being staged by the U.S. and south Korean authorities are a dangerous provocation which may spark off a new war on the Korean Peninsula where a tense situation is prevailing. 
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army issued an order to all the servicepersons of the KPA to be fully combat-ready to cope with the moves of the U.S. and south Korean authorities for a war. And a spokesman for the KPA General Staff clarified the stand of the KPA to counter with strong blows any enemy's hostile act of infringing upon the sovereignty of the country even a bit.
					
					 The statement strongly demanded the U.S. and south Korean authorities immediately stop the on-going nuclear war exercises targeted against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo Automovilistico Sungri.
					Sobre todo, el Dirigente recorrio el monumento a la direccion sobre el terreno realizada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung erguido en el recinto de la empresa y los edificios historicos.
					
					Desde el 20 de octubre de 1950, dia historico en que el Presidente fijo personalmente el solar de esa fabrica previendo el porvenir de la patria victoriosa, el la visito 14 veces para iluminar el camino a seguir por ella como parte de sus incansables esfuerzos fisicos y espirituales por el desarrollo de la industria automovilistica.
					
					Gracias a la prevision de largo alcance y a la sabia direccion del Presidente, se inicio la nueva historia de la industria automovilistica de nuestro pais y se construyo esta poderosa base de produccion de autos al pie del monte Sungri, recordo el Dirigente y anadio que brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria las imborrables hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente.
					
					Aprecio altamente los meritos acumulados anteriormente por el complejo subrayando que la clase obrera de aqui hizo enorme contribucion al desarrollo economico del pais al producir muchos camiones durante mas de 50 anos que datan de 1958 cuando fabrico el primer automovil.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente paso revista a los camiones nuevamente producidos y estuvo en diversos lugares del complejo cerciorandose en detalles del estado de produccion y administracion.
					
					Presento la meta que debe alcanzar el complejo e indico las tareas y remedios para este fin.
					
					El problema mas importante para el aumento vertiginoso de la produccion de vehiculos es realizar en un alto nivel la modernizacion y la fundamentacion cientifica del complejo, destaco.
					
					Para este fin, -agrego- se debe impulsar con constancia la reestructuracion tecnica de los importantes procesos en virtud de un minucioso plan y las ramas vinculadas han de producir y suministrar a tiempo los equipos necesarios.
					
					A fin de terminar en un corto plazo la gigantesca obra de renovacion tecnica en este complejo, es preciso intensificar la asistencia del Estado, enfatizo y resolvio los problemas que se presentan en esta labor.
					
					Tras averiguar los detalles de las labores para el mejor acondicionamiento de la empresa que se desarrollan activamente, asevero que la clase obrera muy revolucionaria y organizada debe tomar la delantera tambien en el establecimiento de la cultura de produccion y la de vida.
					
					Dijo que para poner de pleno manifiesto el entusiasmo revolucionario de los obreros, los funcionarios directivos del complejo tienen que organizar con mayor acierto las labores politicas y economicas y prestar profunda atencion al servicio de abastecimiento para los empleados.
					
					Aseguro que todos los militantes del partido y los trabajadores del complejo podran cumplir perfectamente la tarea presentada esta vez si trabajan con aquel temple con que en la decada de 1970, alcanzaron la meta de produccion de 10 mil camiones.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il se reune con secretario del comite del PCCH en Shandong
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il se reune con secretario del comite del PCCH en Shandong
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ATCC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Il, de visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Popular China, departio el dia 17 en Jinan en ambiente amistoso con Jiang Yikang, secretario del Comite Provincial del Partido Comunista de China en Shandong.
					  En la ocasion participaron el ministro de Industria Metalurgica Kim Thae Bong, el ministro de Agricultura Kim Chang Sik, el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, el ministro de Cultura Kang Nung Su y el embajador coreano acreditado en China, Choe Jin Su.
					
					  Tambien, estuvieron presentes Jiang Daming, gobernador del Gobierno Popular de la Provincia de Shandong y el embajador chino en Corea, Liu Xiaoming.
					
					Ese dia, el Comite Provincial del PCCh en Shandong y el Gobierno Popular de la Provincia de Shangdong ofrecieron banquete en honor del premier coreano Kim Yong Il.

articles.title: Fuentes termales de Corea con gran eficiencia curative
articles.content:
Fuentes termales de Corea con gran eficiencia curativa
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ATCC) -- En Corea hay muchas fuentes termales que estan distribuidas principalmente en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y del Norte, de Hwanghae del Sur, de Kangwon y de Hamgyong del Norte.
					Existen fuentes termales de radon de los sanatorios Kim Jong Suk y de los ex militares heridos de Talchon, las de Songchon, Ongjin, Sechon y Pochonnaegok que surten gran virtud curativa para las enfermedades del sistema cardiovascular de corazon y nervioso, la secuela de la operacion, la deterioracion del musculo y piel, el restrinimiento despues de la operacion, osteomielitis cronica, artritis reumatica, enfermedades ginecologicas, dermatosis y sistema digestivo.
					
					Las fuentes termales azufradas de Sinchon y  Paechon surten efecto curativo para dermatosis, por la accion directa de los iones azufrados sobre la piel y la membrana mucosa del aparato respiratorio y la accion de los compuestos de azufre absorbidos.
					
					Las aguas manantiales cloricas de Phyongnam, Unchon y el no.2 de Yon-an son recomendables para la curacion de la hipertension.
					
					En las zonas de las fuentes termales estan instalados los sanatorios dotados de los modernos aparatos y equipos curativos para el fomento de la salud de los trabajadores, la prevencion y curacion de las enfermedades.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena a Ri Ki Thaek
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena a Ri Ki Thaek
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ATCC) -- En estos dias, el "consejo consultivo por la democracia, la paz y la reunificacion" del Sur de Corea realiza la "gira de conferencias" por todas partes del suelo surcoreano bajo el pretexto de "eliminar las discrepancias entre personas en cuanto a la politica hacia el Norte" y lograr el "acuerdo de todo el pueblo".
					  Esta "gira", que continuara hasta abril, no pasa de ser una barata farsa anti-reunificacion para elogiar la "politica sobre el Norte" del traidor Lee Myung Bak e inculcar la conciencia de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 18 y continua:
					
					  Por ejemplo, al impartir recientemente en Inchon una "conferencia" como parte de esa gira, el vicepresidente en jefe de la entidad arriba mencionada, Ri Ki Thaek, dijo que la reunificacion sera "posible cuando se obtenga el permiso" de los paises vecinos.
					
					  En su esencia, este disparate aboga por la division perenne de la nacion coreana porque demanda el "permiso" a la reunificacion de las fuerzas foraneas, que son responsables de la division.
					
					  Tambien, se encamina a justificar los actos criminales antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de la banda de Lee Myung Bak como involucrar a las fuerzas foraneas en el problema de reunificacion desafiando al deseo de toda la nacion coreana.
					
					  De esta manera, quedo evidenciado que ese "consejo consultivo" compuesto por los vendepatrias de la calana de Ri Ki Thaek, que se sustentan apoyandose en las fuerzas extranjeras, no pasa de ser la entidad de titeres inutil a la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  Si Ri y otros politicastros lacayos del traidor Lee siguen vendiendo la dignidad y los intereses nacionales a las fuerzas foraneas, empeorando las relaciones Norte-Sur y obstaculizando la reunificacion independiente, seran castigados severamente por la historia.
					
					  Los compinches del citado "consejo consultivo" deberan parar su payasada anti-reunificacion (gira de conferencias) teniendo presente de que ella les adelantara su autodestruccion.
